content.rendered:
Directed by Akshay Indikar

Written by Akshay Indikar

star Abhay Mahajan. Prashant Gite. Aarya Rothe. Girish Kulkarni. Shrikant Yadav. Nandini Pakhre. Makrand Saptarshi. Hemant Adam. Anjali Joglekar. Shubhangi Shete. Makarand Mukund. Adwaita Jadhav. Karishma Rathod. Avinash Gaikwad. Mahesh Hosale. Amar Gaikwad. Varsha Malwadkar. Gajanan Paranjpe. Somnath Limbarkar. Sagar Doltade. Bhagwan Mhasge. Chandu Dhumal. Akshaya Upalanchi. Akshara Upalanchi.

Language Marathi

Producer Arfi Lamba. Katharina Suckale. Arvind Pakhle

Production Chitrakathi Nirmitee. Bombay Berlin Film Productions. Firta Cinema
